name: pouchdb-quick-search

0.1.0.name: pouchdb-quick-search
0.1.0.description: PouchDB Quick Search - persisted full-text search for PouchDB

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js -o dist/pouchdb.quick-search.js && npm run min
scripts.dev: browserify test/test.js > test/test-bundle.js && npm run dev-server

1.2.0.name: pouchdb-quick-search
1.2.0.description: PouchDB Quick Search - persisted full-text search for PouchDB

scripts.build: mkdirp dist && browserify . -p bundle-collapser/plugin -t es3ify -s PouchQuickSearch > dist/pouchdb.quick-search.js && npm run min
scripts.dev: browserify test/test.js > test/test-bundle.js && npm run dev-server
